channel.title: Sotw #1
channel.description:
Ok, this one WILL be run every week by me. I will update every week. The contest will end on sunday!
This Weeks Theme Is: Freestyle
Additional Rules - Brushes Allowed - Pre Made Signatures Are Not Allowed! - Maximum size of 700X250
Basics - Entering multiple times is an automatic Disqualification! - Enter under more than 1 UserName is an automatic Disqualification!
If you accidently break the rules please contact me through a PM!
Comments are allowed but DO NOT go off topic!
Entries are allowed until I post *Closed. You cannot enter this contest after that has been posted!
The winner recieves 5 points in my Battle Arena highscores list. The runner up recieves 2.
The Rules! 1. You entree must be made by you and only you! The only exception for this is the render and brushes used! 2. Only 1 entree per person! 3. Your entree must follow the weeks theme! 4. Comments are aloud but do not go off topic! If you go off topic your entree will be disqualified! 5. Failure to follow the rules WILL result in an Automatic disqualification and a Suspension/Ban from future SOTW and other contests! You will also recieve a suspension from the Battle Arena!
Please follow these rules.....Please
YOU MAY CHANGE YOUR SUBMISSION IF YOU WISH BY EDITING YOUR ORIGINAL POST! YOU MAY CHANGE YOUR SUBMISSION FOR AS LONG AS THIS THREAD IS OPEN!
Voting will begin on a seperate thread on Sunday!
Let the contest begin :)
